description: Poor instructions. Controls confusing and primitive. Reference to a text file and website is vague and unclear. Not encouraging for a beginner.
summary: A clever concept but very unintuitive to use

description:
Probably the most severe drawback is that the listed website is no longer an active domain. The small list of keyboard hotkeys is somewhat helpful, but the link for additional help is dead.

The app allows you to set up several planets, but I wasn't able to find a way of adding a central star. The planets interact in two dimensions simulating gravity. You can, for example, illustrate the behaviour of a binary planet system like Pluto and Charon. When planets collide, they general just merge to form a larger planet. The hotkey implementation does not give you much control over the actual initial conditions.
me gusta mucho este simulador. es muy bueno. ahora quiero una pc mas potente.
summary: Parezco gato siguiendo un apuntador laser
